required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Kinematic Comparison of Vanguard XP and Vanguard CR Total Knee Arthroplasties
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Vanguard XP and Vanguard CR Total Knee Arthroplasties: A Cross Sectional Pilot Study Evaluating Intraarticular Kinematics and Standing Balance by Dynamic Fluoroscopy and Force Plate Examination

brief_summary.textblock:
Primary: The primary objective of this pilot study is to compare the intraarticular kinematics by fluoroscopy of Vanguard XP to that of Vanguard CR.
Secondary: The secondary objective of this pilot study is to compare the standing balance by force plate of patients with the Vanguard XP prosthesis to those who have Vanguard CR prosthesis. Furthermore, we wish to assess isometric quadriceps muscle strength in both groups.

primary_outcome.measure: Anterior-posterior translation of the femoral component with respect to the tibia component
primary_outcome.time_frame: at least one year post surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Axial rotation of the femoral component with respect to the tibia component
primary_outcome.time_frame: at least one year post surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Traveled distance of center of pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at least one year post surgery
at least one year post surgery
at least one year post surgery
at least one year post surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Group mean in newton meter pr. kilograms weight (Nm/kg)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard XP
arm_group.description: The new Vanguard XP Total knee arthroplasty system is a further development of the Vanguard TKA. The new Vanguard XP system both cruciate ligaments are preserved.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard CR
arm_group.description: Total knee arthroplasty system without preservation of the anterior cruciate ligament

intervention.intervention_name: Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard XP
intervention.arm_group_label: Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard XP
Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard CR

intervention.intervention_name: Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard CR
intervention.arm_group_label: Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard XP
Total knee arthroplasty with Vanguard CR

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participant in the XP vs. CR study (inherited traits from study inclusion)
- Overall healthy. Have attended standard physiotherapy after unilateral total knee replacement
- Are able to perform the tasks
- Excellent clinical scores (Oxford Knee Score above 39 at 1 year follow up)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Knee pain above 20 on a 0-100 visual analogue scale
- Any clinical relevant pain from adjacent joints
- Active Knee flexion below 100
- Signs of implant migration, loosening, and implant mal-alignment

overall_contact.last_name: Anders Troelsen, MD, Ph.d., Dr.Med., Professor

facility.name: Dept. of Orthopaedic Surgery, Copenhagen University Hospital Hvidovre
